feed.title: Dokploy Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dokploy: v0.16.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • 540 need more control over docker compose command in deployments by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/963
  • style(notifications): fixed white style by @190km in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/967
  • feat(logs): use fancy-ansi for ansi colors by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/965
  • fix: prevent Esc key from closing terminal modals by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/968
  • fix: fixed/improved handling of app names in api by @acgonzales in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/904
  • feat: add swarm overview page by @DJKnaeckebrot in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/921
  • style(preview-deployment): better preview deployment card by @190km in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/938
  • feat: option to delete docker volumes on service deletion by @DJKnaeckebrot in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/886
  • feat(notifications): discord decoration toggle by @joaotonaco in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/962
  • fix(setup): use traefik port/version from env by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/972
  • feat(preview-deployments): new UI by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/974
  • feat(traefik/ports): improved UI by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/977
  • fix: show error message when compose builder throws by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/979
  • feat: add hide extra logs by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/984
  • fix(certificates): ensure certificates are accessible by traefik by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/971
  • fix: turn off autoComplete for some inputs by @Barsnes in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/985
  • feat: add support for viewing docker logs in swarm mode by @faytranevozter in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/931
  • Refactor/add no trunc by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/989
  • fix: omit macos files and create folders every time by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/990
  • feat(i18n): add Spanish language support by @jmsx in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/994
  • feat: mongo replica sets by @thewilloftheshadow in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/926
  • feat(i18n): add Norwegian language support by @Barsnes in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/997
  • fix: typo Logssss > Logs by @190km in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/999
  • fix: remove unused parsed by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1005
  • Feat: simplify node service log & add badge color on list service/container by @faytranevozter in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1000
  • v0.16.0 by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1006

New Contributors

  • @acgonzales made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/904
  • @joaotonaco made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/962
  • @Barsnes made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/985
  • @faytranevozter made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/931
  • @jmsx made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/994
  • @thewilloftheshadow made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/926

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/compare/v0.15.1...v0.16.0

entry.title: New release for Dokploy: v0.16.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: swarm overview style by @190km in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1016
  • fix: inconsistent service card height by @joaotonaco in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1011
  • feat: prevent layout shifting from scrollbar by @joaotonaco in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1010
  • convert email to lower case when loging in by @champ3oy in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1020
  • Spelling and grammar corrections by @jocubeit in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1019
  • Fix/memory reservation by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1021
  • fix: add try catch inside of cron jobs by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1022
  • fix: add provider value in edit destination by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1023
  • refactor: add fallback ipv4 by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1024
  • feat: i18n displays real lang name by @190km in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/995
  • feat: add unifi template by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1025
  • fix: missing norwegian lang in select by @190km in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1026
  • feat: local server terminal access by @szwabodev in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/959
  • v0.16.1 by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1027

New Contributors

  • @champ3oy made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1020
  • @jocubeit made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1019

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/compare/v0.16.0...v0.16.1

entry.title: New release for Dokploy: v0.17.0
entry.content:
Deployments for databases

You probably got frustrated because you couldn't see if any error occurred when you deployed a database, now when you deploy it will show you a sidebar with the real time deployments.

Dashboard Redesign

We believe the design we had was good, but when it came to moving through the different sections it was a lot of work so we decided to give the interface a fresh new look.

What's Changed

  • feat(i18n): add missing keys to Polish translation by @designorant in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1028
  • refactor: enhance ManageTraefikPorts with ScrollArea for better UI by @vishalkadam47 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1029
  • fix(huly-template): resolve issue with wrong domain by @DJKnaeckebrot in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1032
  • style(2fa): make pin input centered and make boarder more white to make it more visible by @DJKnaeckebrot in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1030
  • feat(template): add checkmate template by @DJKnaeckebrot in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1033
  • style: swarm style improvement by @190km in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1038
  • feat: shows req when is active by @190km in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1037
  • feat: use check updates modal for update available in navbar by @szwabodev in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1042
  • style: enhance favicon with dark mode support by @designorant in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1049
  • style: environment style improvement by @Pi-Bouf in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1047
  • refactor: add text for run command by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1052
  • fix: added unzip to server setup by @wyattjoh in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1051
  • refactor: remove unnecessary error logging in GPU setup functions by @vishalkadam47 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1055
  • fix: Update Vaultwarden version to 1.32.7 [CVE fix] by @jmsx in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1060
  • Updated Chinese translation by @SIPC in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1053
  • Added GLPI template by @mohabgabber in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1039
  • feat(i18n): azerbaijani language by @kerimovok in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1054
  • docs(contribution): fix template index.ts by @nktnet1 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1064
  • feat(template): added Gotenberg, a Docker-powered stateless API for PDF files by @nktnet1 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1065
  • Update wordpress version to latest by @yiiman-dev in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1068
  • fix: connection to local server terminal by @szwabodev in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1066
  • feat(i18n): indonesian language by @shiqocred in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1082
  • fix(ui): full width for body tag by @nktnet1 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1078
  • refactor: better focus-visible a11y by @Barsnes in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1017
  • Feat/add sidebar by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1084
  • feat(i18n): add missing keys and improve wording in Traditional Chinese translations by @sao-coding in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1091
  • style: enhance template selection UI and add view modes toggle by @vishalkadam47 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1094
  • feat(template): added conduit, a matrix homeserver by @IT-ess in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1087
  • fix(notifications): discord decoration tiny adjustment by @joaotonaco in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1086
  • feat(template): added Actual Budget, a super fast and privacy-focused app for managing your finances by @nktnet1 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1080
  • fix: add prefix and remove resolution esm flag by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1095
  • v0.17.0 by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1096

New Contributors

  • @designorant made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1028
  • @Pi-Bouf made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1047
  • @wyattjoh made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1051
  • @SIPC made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1053
  • @nktnet1 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1064
  • @yiiman-dev made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1068
  • @shiqocred made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1082
  • @IT-ess made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1087

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/compare/v0.16.1...v0.17.0

entry.title: New release for Dokploy: v0.17.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: query for ssh keys to show servers, rather than default empty by @nktnet1 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1098
  • fix: adjust size of cards and add ssh keys by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1099
  • v0.17.1 by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1100

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/compare/v0.17.0...v0.17.1
